website_summaries.verdict: This model offers good sound and reliable Bluetooth connectivity. It gets top marks for its excellent durability.
pros: 10 watts of power produces clear, loud sound
Designed for listening in outdoor environments
USB power bank can be used to charge other devices such as smartphones and MP3 players
When used in outdoor environments, the durability of the BRV-X really shines
The molding is rubber-coated to withstand shocks from accidental impacts, and the waterproof exterior protects against even the worst of conditions
Listen no matter the weather conditions
The Bluetooth connection remains reliable in all conditions as well
cons: The 12-hour battery life is not bad, but we wish this unit designed for outdoor use had the longer battery life of some other Braven models

customer_reviews.title: Went from YEAH to MEH...
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker at first... This is my second one and it's loosing its sound quality. Not as loud as it used to be and the speaker is crackling at "high" volumes. Unfortunately this is what happened to my first one. I lost that one though before I could try to get it serviced. The fact that it's happening again leads me to believe it will happen to them all. Really a shame because nothing comes close to this as far as quality loudness goes.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Braven BRV-X love the product sounds and portability when it worked but ...
customer_reviews.text: Braven BRV-X love the product sounds and portability when it worked but it DIED soon after use so disappointed...it is within 30 days refund time so returning it back. Tip: if you really want to buy it make sure to get proper warranty as from the comments on other posts I can see there is no warranty if you buy it not from Braven retail. Just as a note: also have Braven BRV-1, died in 10 months, luckily had proper warranty and got new one, new one still works fine. Braven do something with this products so they do not get broken so easily!!
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: LoVE it. Worth considering.
customer_reviews.text: Both my son and I have owned these for over three years. They work great, long lasting battery, quality sound for the price and value. The only complaint I have is that we were very disappointed in sound when two are synced together. Definitely durable, water resistant and perfect for portable blue tooth sound. Range is decent. Easy to sync. I recommend considering it for indoor and close range out door use.
customer_reviews.author: Got Me Off

customer_reviews.title: GREAT speakers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best speakers we have EVER purchased. We have bought "water resistant" speakers before for $20-30 and they were no louder than the speaker on my Iphone 5. These are INCREDIBLE, they get quite loud! We bought two, and used them at my daughter's B-Day party at the park. She danced around like crazy and we had them paired for surround sound, so we clipped one to each side of the tent! It was really awesome. My wife accidentally dropped one down our steep "stairs of doom." It bounced around but it still pairs, plays perfect, and doesn't seem to have any issues. These were definitely worth the $130 each!
customer_reviews.author: JD and Cali

customer_reviews.title: Very small bluetooth range
customer_reviews.text: For the most part we like this speaker but it has at least one major flaw. If we move our phone more than 5ft away from the speaker the sound cuts out. For a bluetooth speaker to boast about how amazing it is, having such a small bluetooth range seems absurd. Kind of defeats the purpose of it being bluetooth if you're chained to having your phone so close to the speaker at all times. We plan on contacting Braven about this in the hopes that our speaker has something specifically wrong with it and that we can get one without this issue. Otherwise, if this is normal I would not recommend this speaker to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tomaszewski

customer_reviews.title: Can't really recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this speaker for about 15 months. Things started great with this one (however, I also purchased an 855s which Braven had to replace within a few weeks). Unfortunately now it no longer pairs with my other BRV-X' very well, there's lots of skipping, and it's making a lot of popping and hissing sounds. And, the warranty is only for 1 year. Brilliant idea, good implementation, but not durable. Wouldn't really recommend for the money.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it is charging
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I have had the same problem as many of the other people here. After 11 months my Braven BRV-X just quit. It looks like it is charging, but it won't turn on. I had an earlier problem with my power cord, I contacted Braven and they sent me a new one free of charge. However, after using it for two weeks the speaker just stopped working. I also found it hard to link to other deivces via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Sound & Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mount on my Jetski so I can have some tunes while riding. It fits nicely below the handlebars and comes with a mounting strap. The battery life has been great and the sound is incredible! It has two modes once for inside and one for outside which seems to project more. We took it to the beach a few times and had groups of people coming around to check it out. Easily one of the best sound bluetooth speakers I've heard especially since its waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speakers by Braven
customer_reviews.text: I've had a braven speaker before, but it was one of the smaller, indoor ones. I am constantly astounded with how much sound comes out of these speakers. The BRV-X is great for outdoors as well as indoors, the sound is clear and well rounded as well. I used the speakerphone the other day and have never had such an easy time trying to communicate with someone while others of my family were trying to listen in and making comments. I haven't really tried to test the durability of the speaker, but have had no worries when putting it next to a very splashy sink. I can't wait to get a second and try out the wireless stereo sound.
customer_reviews.author: NL Cook

customer_reviews.title: Sounds really good. I also use this as a conference call ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really good. I also use this as a conference call speaker when working from home. So much better than an earpiece as I do not get blown out now when I turn the volume up for someone who whispers on calls and then someone booming starts speaking. Pairing is easy, occasionally a pain to switch between our phones, but I think that is the nature of multiplicity and bluetooth and easily taken care of by turning off Bluetooth on the other device when re-pairing.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great, however
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, however, after a few months, the bluetooth capabilities started to fail. The sound began to glitch if the speaker was more than a few feet away from my laptop. I've always checked the battery when this happens, and it has never been the case that it was on it's last bar. In other words, battery charge is not the problem. Disappointed since this makes the speaker A LOT less portable, and I bought it for the purpose of portability.
customer_reviews.author: Dal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker, it's so nice not having to worry about getting it wet or getting dust in the connectors, they are all sealed! Works well, has amazing sound and volume and wow...what a great battery life. I don't have to charge very often and when I do it charges quickly and is ready for the next go round. It has an indoor and louder setting for outdoor. You lose a bit of the base sound on outdoor but still sounds really good. Has a nice rugged look to it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya W

customer_reviews.title: The brave and PRV-ex is probably the best portable speaker I have ever heard
customer_reviews.text: The brave and PRV-ex is probably the best portable speaker I have ever heard. I have tried and tested many speakers but this one by far has the best base in trouble range that come a crossed. It's not a small as what I thought it would be, but the sound in the battery life offsets the size. I can take this camping or are traveling on a trip I also use it as a speakerphone in hotels and I'm working out of town. I would buy this speaker again and again. Can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Joele

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this speaker
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this speaker!!! We bought two and they sound outstanding together. It's very handy going outdoors hiking and having your own "theme music" while on your hike. They last forever, and do charge your phones while playing music. It doesn't take much for iPhones to charge, but Samsung/LG phones take a lot of battery juice to charge up. We used 1 speaker on full charge and played for over 8 hrs and still had 2 bars left. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Moliassa

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker but not the best sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, this is a fantastic overall speaker for both indoors or out. I did however order the Bose Minilink two months before and I prefer the Bose. The Braven has several features that the Bose lacks but as far as overall sound I will stick with the Bose and give the Braven to my son. The Braven sounds best at mid level volume where the Bose wins at all levels. The Braven reaches a higher volume overall but loundness is not my preference as we normally have it setting close on the back deck enjoying a glass of wine. Just my personal opinion mind you.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Have owned several Braven boxes and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Have owned several Braven boxes and this one is by far the best. Has been knocked into pool several times and still works like the day I got it. Holds a charge well, but if you're using it at a day at the pool, may want to bring your charger just in case. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: 06 Street Bob

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are wonderful. I take mine to work (I work in ...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are wonderful. I take mine to work (I work in construction) and beat the crap out of it. It washes off easily, does fine when it starts to rain, and holds a charge when using all day (sometimes more than one day, depending on how I use it). I actually use this as speaker phone in my truck as well and it works great. I pair it with my wife's speaker when we have outdoor BBQs for sound inside and outside the house. The range is pretty decent between your phone and the speaker and it really does get pretty loud for such a small thing. Would hands down buy this again and recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Byrne

customer_reviews.title: nice product, but it was a little smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: nice product, but it was a little smaller than expected and not nearly as loud as I thought it would be. Plenty of other products out there, but the main reason I bought this one is because it is waterproof. But there is a cap on the back that screws on over all the electrical connections and it is kind of flimsy and not very secure in my mind. Haven't had it in any water yet, but make sure the cap is screwed on as tight as you can get it or you're gonna have problems.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS FISHER

customer_reviews.title: I like the overall rugged feel of the device and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The Braven BRV-X portable wireless bluetooth speaker is deserving of its World-Class reputation. I like the overall rugged feel of the device and the included carry strap. The indoor/outdoor sound selector is an enjoyable feature, along with the water-resistant finish. The size of the unit is compact enough to carry in my backpack. Finally, it throws a rich bass sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great little sturdy speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. The sound quality is great for a little sturdy portable speaker. I have taken it on a boat trip and it's great sound quality. The speaker quality is great when a phone call comes in while you're listening to music. You do have to be kinda close to it though but I expect that out of any Bluetooth speaker. The only draw back I found is that my husband and I have paired both of our phones to it and if both Bluetooth signals are turned on, it will not play so one of us has to turn our Bluetooth off.
customer_reviews.author: Huong

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Only A Year And A Half
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my speaker November 2015. It was a pretty good speaker overall and I loved that the sound quality was pretty good in both indoor and outdoor mode. Unfortunately, my speaker has started spontaneously shutting off (which started a year and a half after purchase). Now it shuts off after every 5 minutes or so. Had the speaker lasted longer it would have received a much higher review. I think my next speaker will be JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews...  quality concerns.
customer_reviews.text: DOA.... Wouldn't charge, all dark on battery indicator lights, and charger confirmed working with multimeter.
customer_reviews.author: A2Z

customer_reviews.title: I like the ease of use and connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use and connectivity, but the sound can come across a little too bassy in outdoor mode, and it does not stand up to the sound fidelity of a smaller, more affordable wireless Bose speaker. But for the price, can't beat the waterproofness. The battery does last forever, at three nights of listening tunes around a campfire, combined with days on a boat. Wish it came with a USB power resupply.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Blue Oyster

customer_reviews.title: Broke with light use- less than one year.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! It won't break easily, awesome battery life and great sound! It's everything you want in a speaker that will spend some time outdoors! I highly recommend it! That's what I said less than a year ago! Now not so much! The thing is broken, speaker sounds awful! We did not use it much but it is now useless. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Beachy Chicken

customer_reviews.title: ... speaker for two years now and it's still the best portable I've come across
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for two years now and it's still the best portable I've come across. Stellar battery life (though that is diminishing somewhat with age), room filling sound, and truly waterproof (submerged several times over the years and wet even more).
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!

I bought this for my work truck so i can listen to talk radio on my Sirius cell phone app. It is built like a tank and on full volume the battery lasts more than 12 hours. I use it every day and love it so far. My only complaint is that its not loud enough to hear over the noise of my tractor trailer if the windows are down unless i hang it from the visor, right by my face.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after the 2nd use...

customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: This thing has great volume and can be heard over quite a distance
customer_reviews.text: This thing has great volume and can be heard over quite a distance. The battery lasts a long time too. The bass is a little weak for a speaker this size. I also have a little Jawbone speaker about 1/3 the size that has better bass. Also, don't misplace the charger as the connector is a hard to find size. Overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: freenv

customer_reviews.title: it's more like 4~ hours
customer_reviews.text: Has survived two tubing trips. Interestingly, the battery lasts a lot longer (longer than the 8 or so hours expected) when I use it at home, but on the river, it's more like 4~ hours. Same volume, same setup, I guess the cold temps may shorten the battery life. Good sound, it's sometimes a little finicky about bluetooth pairing but no major problems. I even had the cap come off and it took a dip in the water, it shut off immediately, but I shook it out and turned it back on, and it worked fine immediately after.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. I haven't tried submerging it in water, but it works pretty well. Good sound quality and it has a pretty good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Vanilla Gorilla

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is not all that good, and whenever I go to use it I ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok but not for the price! The battery life is not all that good, and whenever I go to use it I have to charge it. It seems to drain itself somehow. Also the range is not as they say. I use it on my deck with an iPad feeding it. The iPad is about 15 to 20 feet away and the speaker breaks up .....
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Yes I agree that the clarity is awesome. But this speaker clearly lacks good solid bass
customer_reviews.text: I don't know, it seems that the industry is still perfecting Bluetooth Speakers. This one came with a lot of hype. I've yet to test it with two, which is what people say is the true way to hear it. Yes I agree that the clarity is awesome. But this speaker clearly lacks good solid bass, almost like it should be part of a package containing a subwoofer. Maybe I would feel otherwise with two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Decker

customer_reviews.title: Just, Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Advertised to arrive within 2 business, took more than 5 days to arrive. Now, with that over with, this speaker is by far the most amazing audio device I have ever purchased. It has excellent bass and treble, not to mention it gets so loud you can't even hear yourself think. The indoor/outdoor mode on this things is phenomenal, and the strap is extremely convenient. This speaker is something that I'm going to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough good things about this speaker ! Synced to both my phone and tabelt with no problems. Battery life is very impressive. Lasted 36 holes of golf and still had a few hours left before it died. Sound is very good...mostly listen to rock and thought bass was solid. Will definitely be buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I got it for work
customer_reviews.text: This damn thing is badass, I love it. I got it for work, and have used it for everything else too. Swapping to the outdoor mode really gives it that extra umph it needs in some noisy areas (like near the beach). Great sound, good battery life (i've gotten 8+ hours out of it). Haven't tested the water resistance yet really and hope not too.
customer_reviews.author: That guy that bought that thing

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my power wheelchair. Works ok! Fit right where I needed it to. My only complaint would be the volume on this model, but good enough for most my needs. Braven makes a great product. ..
customer_reviews.author: Raymond  M.Eng

customer_reviews.title: The best speaker for the job at the best price!
customer_reviews.text: This the best speaker I have ever owned. I use it for work everyday and I use it to charge my phone at the same time. It does whats advertised and then some. I'm also impressed with it being water proof. I have spilled coffee on it and washed it off without the speaker getting damaged. Thank you Amazon for the great price and providing a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Brandel

customer_reviews.title: this definitely makes a statement wherever you use it
customer_reviews.text: I looked for different options before finally buying this one. this makes a great impression when people see it. charge lasts very long, solid, sturdy, water safe. just hang it wherever you want and rock the party. NOT a toy, this definitely makes a statement wherever you use it. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Arias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. Caught them while on sale and bought a pair. Work great for outdoors on the deck.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly scooped sound but better than anything else I tried in its price range
customer_reviews.text: Slightly scooped sound but better than anything else I tried in its price range. I tried several dozen speakers at various stores before buying this. Still happy with my decision after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: AZflyman

customer_reviews.title: sounds good for the price
customer_reviews.text: sounds good for the price. heavy duty. BUT the battery sucks. play it for 20 minutes and shut it off and it's completely dead in two days. you have to keep it plugged in all the time.

customer_reviews.title: this is the second one I've bought and i love it. waterproof and great sound loud enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one I've bought and i love it. waterproof and great sound loud enough for the boats at the lake

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Bought another.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Bought one last year and loved it. Decided to do the stereo pairing(vey easy) and bought another one. Sooo worth it. Sitting by the pool with music cranked up on Spotify with Bluetooth. Nice that you can put them anywhere close to the pool. This is thing is awesome. If you buy one, chances are you will buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: david becak

customer_reviews.title: Unqualified recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased the very fine Braven brv-1 but just as many reviews said it distorted at high volumes. My primary use is outdoors so high volume is important. Problem solved by returning the brv-1 and purchasing the brv-x. It works exceptionally well. Loud enough for my needs, very little to no distortion at highest volume and built very ruggedly.
customer_reviews.author: tjb

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase! Will Not Disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and Bluetooth range. We bought this for canoeing and camping but have found many uses for it during the winter months. We can't wait to take it on the river & lake! I only wish there was a better compartment to hold the charger. That was one of the first things we lost.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Waterproof and sand proof makes it great ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Waterproof and sand proof makes it great on the beach. Can control your phone from the unit which is good so you don't have to handle your phone with wet hands or fumble with it to advance to the next song or pause or turn volume up and down including Pandora streaming control. Bluetooth hooks up great to iPhone. Sound is not as good as similar BOSE but it is close.
customer_reviews.author: buddy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker have dunked it in the water multiple times on accident still works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Cms13c

customer_reviews.title: Sweet design, pretty decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding construction, fairly solid bass and clear treble. It gets 4 stars because sound quality could be better, but it's design and build is top notch. Still, I would recommend it for its price as a decent set of speakers both for the room and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my brother and he loves it. He takes it outdoors all the time including when horseback riding... No complaints yet. Sound quality it's great. I own a Bose portable speaker and the difference is very minor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and you will too !
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and very loud sound and last like 12 to 15 hours of battery life .would say it the best I've heard and a good value and looks heavy duty. Not light weight if you need to Carry it hiking but worth it for the sound .
customer_reviews.author: Joey Holman

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, even over the noise of heavy machinery
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in a forklift most of the day, and can't listen to music through headphones. This is now a must have for his work day. He loves it. The sound is great, even over the noise of heavy machinery. The battery lasts all day, and with an overnight charge, is ready for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker. Great quality and super durable. I sailed with this speaker for an entire summer where it experienced salt water, sand, mud, and pool water. The speaker still works just as good as it did in the beginning! It also can be used as a big external battery for your phone! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with these
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with these. They have a VERY full sound for a bluetooth speaker, good base characteristics. Once I returned my $300 Jawbone Big Box (not so good, Braven blew the pants off it), I bought TWO of these for the same as it cost me to get ONE Jawbone, AND these Braven units can be synced to each other to get stereo separation. Stereo on bluetooth speakers is rare, I don't know why, but these sound truly wonderful together!
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Izzo

customer_reviews.title: I love my Braven
customer_reviews.text: I love my Braven. It's pretty rugged, the sound is crisp and clear and works beautifully even on a windy day at the beach, and the charging functions work really well too. It doesn't sound as good as a Bose system, but I think for most people that's an easy logical conclusion. I've had it in the rain and it's been splashed at the pool and it just keeps on ticking. I actually like the rugged look of it too. Also comes with converters for different outlet types which is handy when you travel.
customer_reviews.author: Bididdles

customer_reviews.title: but works great and holds the charge for many hours
customer_reviews.text: it's a bit pricey, but works great and holds the charge for many hours.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a portable speaker, feels very durable, good battery life so far. I wish the linked devices could be further away, but that's probably as much the fault of the other devices as anything. I think I am going to really enjoy this speaker for a long time to come!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his Christmas present. Music by the pool with your teenager . .. .PRICELESS!!

customer_reviews.title: Syncing was very easy, and it arrived fully charged so I could ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality from this speaker is just outstanding. The 'sticky feet' on the bottom are very high quality and ensure that the speaker will not move/fall off any surface. Syncing was very easy, and it arrived fully charged so I could use it immediately.

customer_reviews.text: Best speaker I have purchased. Had one die and Braven was super easy to work with and replaced it right away. Super loud, water proof, great battery life.

customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Great battery life. Great sound. Incredibly durable.

customer_reviews.title: waterproof function works like it should
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker on a whim after watching reviews. I saw it as one of the top 10 speakers on CNet. Connectivity is seamless, waterproof function works like it should, indoor/outdoor sound is a great option. The only thing I wish I had was an additional grey brv-x for color variance. I highly recommend this speaker for any situation
customer_reviews.author: Preston Mossman

customer_reviews.text: As a speaker, it works and sounds just fine. However, I purchased this item to function wirelessly, and the range is poor.
